sense.gloss: to be bewildered, to be perplexed

sdata.j: しかし、どうしてそうなるのかについては↑私↑↓わたし↓は↑説明↑↓せつめい↓に|とまどう|。
sdata.e: But how that comes about I am at a loss to explain.

sdata.j: ↑彼↑↓かれ↓は↑私↑↓わたし↓たちが↑戸惑↑↓|とまど↓う|と↑喜↑↓よろこ↓ぶ。
sdata.e: He is pleased when we are bewildered.

sdata.j: ツッコミどころ↑多↑↓おお↓すぎて|とまどう|。
sdata.e: There are so many things that are off with that that I don't even know which to point out first.
